articles.title: Gucci owner Kering fails to reverse sales slide - Financial Times
articles.description: Luxury fashion group reports 6% drop in fourth-quarter sales as it invests in brands
articles.content:
French luxury group Kering failed to arrest a slide in sales in the fourth quarter, underlining the pressure on the company to revive the fortunes of its flagship Gucci brand.

articles.author: Stephen Nellis, Max Cherney, Arsheeya Bajwa
articles.title: Arm shares surge on strong forecast of AI-fueled chip upgrades - Reuters
articles.description: Arm surged more than 30% on Wednesday after the British tech company forecast quarterly sales and profit above Wall Street expectations as customers aim to design new chips for artificial intelligence work, generating higher royalties.
